a22.l: select a1.caption,a1.processowner,a1.axpdef_peg_processmasterid from axpdef_peg_processmaster a1 order by a1.caption
select distinct cast(caption||'-('||name||')' as varchar(500)) title, name,caption from tstructs order by 1

formcaption.a14: IIF(tasktype={Make} & ISEmpty(formcaption)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select cast(caption||'-('||fname||')' as varchar(200)),fname from axpflds where tstruct = :transid order by 1

KeyFieldcaption.a14: IIF(tasktype={Make} & ISEmpty(KeyFieldcaption)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select max(indexno)+1 from axprocessdefv2 where processname = :processname

select cast(appr as varchar(50)) as appr, flg,0 dmy FROM (select 'Reporting manager' appr,1 flg from dual union all select 'Actor' appr,2 flg from dual union all select 'Role' appr,3 flg from dual where 1=2 union all select 'From form field' appr,4 flg from dual union ALL select 'NA' appr,5 flg from dual union all select 'Skip level' appr,6 flg from dual union all select 'Prior level user' appr,7 flg from dual where :indexno > 1 )a order by flg
select amendment from axpdef_peg_processmaster where axpdef_peg_processmasterid = :axpdef_peg_processmasterid

assigntoflg.a59: Reporting manager=1, Actor=2, Role=3, From form field=4

a22.l: select cast(actorname as varchar(250)),ord from (select actorname,1 ord from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=1 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3) union all select actorname,2 ord from (select DISTINCT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(sprocessname, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) process,actorname,2 ord from axpdef_peg_actor a where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=2 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3) CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (sprocessname,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL order by 1)a where process = :processname union all select 'None',2 ord from dual)a order by ord,1

assigntoactor.a14: iif(assignto={Actor} & ISEmpty(assigntoactor)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: SELECT * FROM (select transid from axprocessdefv2 where processname = :processname and stransid !='pgv2c' and indexno < :indexno order by indexno DESC) WHERE rownum=1
select groupname from axusergroups a order by 1

AssignToRole.a14: iif(AssignTo={Role} & ISEmpty(AssignToRole)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

useridentificationfilter.a59: select groupname from UserGroupMaster order by 1

a22.l: select cast(fcaption as varchar(300)),fname,ord from (select caption||'-('||fname||')' fcaption,tstruct||'.'||fname fname,1 ord from axpflds where tstruct = :fromfieldtransid union all select DISTINCT b.caption||'-'||TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparamsui, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)), TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparams, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)),2 ord from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (taskparamsui,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)a order by ord,1

formfieldscaption.a14: iif(assignto={From form field} & ISEmpty(formfieldscaption)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select cast(txt as varchar(40)) txt,cnd from (select 'Initiator skip level' txt,1 cnd from dual union all select 'User skip level',2 cnd from dual)a order by cnd

skipleveluser.a14: iif(assigntoflg={6} & ISEmpty(skipleveluser)={T},{ cannot be left empty},{T})

a22.l: select taskname from axprocessdefv2 where processname = :processname and indexno < :indexno and (length(ParentTaskName)=0 or ParentTaskName is null) order by indexno

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,1 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:transid union all select 'AxVars_'||b.db_function||'-('||a.db_vartype||db_varname||')' fldcaption,db_varname fname,'axvars' cnd,4 ord from axpdef_axvars_dbvar a,axpdef_axvars b where b.axpdef_axvarsid=a.axpdef_axvarsid union all select 'Login username-(cusername)' fldcaption,'username' fname,'axvars' cnd,2 ord from dual union all select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname,'GloVar',3 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' )a order by 4,1
select fn_ruledef_formula( :applicability_tbl,'T','F','','','v2') from dual

usebusinessdatelogic.a2: Consider only business dates for Escalations/Reminders

a22.l: select cast(axpdef_peg_actorid as numeric) from (select axpdef_peg_actorid from axpdef_peg_actor where 'None'!=:assigntoactor and actorname = :assigntoactor union all select axpdef_peg_actorid from axpdef_peg_actor where 'None'=:assigntoactor and process = :processname and taskname = :taskname)a

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select 'Date of notification' fldcaption,null fname ,'static' cnd,1 ord from dual union all select 'Date of initiation' fldcaption,null fname ,'static' cnd,2 ord from dual union ALL select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,3 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:transid and datatype='d' union all select 'AxVars_'||b.db_function||'-('||a.db_vartype||db_varname||')' fldcaption,db_varname fname,'axvars' cnd,4 ord from axpdef_axvars_dbvar a,axpdef_axvars b where b.axpdef_axvarsid=a.axpdef_axvarsid and a.db_vartype='d' union all select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname,'GloVar',5 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and datatype='d' union all select taskparams,fname,'Taskparam',6 from (select DISTINCT b.caption||'-'||TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparamsui, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))taskparams, TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparams, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))fname from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (taskparamsui,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)a where substr(fname,1,1)='d') order by 4,1

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select 'Date of notification' fldcaption,null fname ,'static' cnd,1 ord from dual union all select 'Date of initiation' fldcaption,null fname ,'static' cnd,2 ord from dual union ALL select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,3 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:transid and datatype='d' union all select 'AxVars_'||b.db_function||'-('||a.db_vartype||db_varname||')' fldcaption,db_varname fname,'axvars' cnd,4 ord from axpdef_axvars_dbvar a,axpdef_axvars b where b.axpdef_axvarsid=a.axpdef_axvarsid and a.db_vartype='d' union all select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname,'GloVar',5 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and datatype='d' union all select taskparams,fname,'Taskparam',6 from (select DISTINCT b.caption||'-'||TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparamsui, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))taskparams, TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparams, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))fname from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (taskparamsui,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)a where substr(fname,1,1)='d') order by 4,1
select case when :recid = 0 then ':' || :keyfield else :DisplayTitle end from dual
select case when :recid = 0 then ':' || :keyfield else :DIsplayContent end from dual
select cast(cnd as varchar(50)) cnd,cndval,ord from (select 'Set value to field' cnd,4 cndval,6 ord from dual)a order by ord
select :cmd from dual

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(500)) fldcaption,fname,setvaluefor,cnd,ord from( select caption||'-('||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,case when asgrid ='T' then 'activerow' else '0' end setvaluefor, 'field' cnd,1 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:transid )a order by 5,1
select fn_ruledef_table_genaxscript( :cmd, :tbldtls, cast( :pcnd as numeric)) from dual

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select 'Date of notification' fldcaption,'static.ax__don' fname ,'static' cnd,1 ord from dual union all select 'Date of initiation' fldcaption,'static.ax__doi' fname ,'static' cnd,2 ord from dual union ALL select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,3 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:transid and datatype='d' union all select 'AxVars_'||b.db_function||'-('||a.db_vartype||db_varname||')' fldcaption,db_varname fname,'axvars' cnd,4 ord from axpdef_axvars_dbvar a,axpdef_axvars b where b.axpdef_axvarsid=a.axpdef_axvarsid and a.db_vartype='d' union all select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname,'GloVar',5 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and datatype='d' union all select taskparams,fname,'Taskparam',6 from (select DISTINCT b.caption||'-'||TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparamsui, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))taskparams, TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparams, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))fname from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (taskparamsui,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)a where substr(fname,1,1)='d') order by 4,1
select generate_series(1,30)

rem_mailndays.a2: Reminder mail for every Nth day

a22.l: select name mslist,'Templates' groupby,1 grouporder,'F' selected from axnotificationdef order by name

select concat(cast(numb as varchar(10)),case when numb='1' then ' day' when numb not in('Auto','1') then ' days' end),ord,case when numb='Auto' then 0 else cast(numb as numeric) end ord1 from (select cast(generate_series(1,30) as varchar(2)) numb,2 ord from dual union all select 'Auto',1 ord)b order by 3
select generate_series(1,30)

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord from( select 'Date of notification' fldcaption,null fname ,'static' cnd,1 ord from dual union all select 'Date of initiation' fldcaption,null fname ,'static' cnd,2 ord from dual union ALL select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,3 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:transid and datatype='d' union all select 'AxVars_'||b.db_function||'-('||a.db_vartype||db_varname||')' fldcaption,db_varname fname,'axvars' cnd,4 ord from axpdef_axvars_dbvar a,axpdef_axvars b where b.axpdef_axvarsid=a.axpdef_axvarsid and a.db_vartype='d' union all select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname,'GloVar',5 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and datatype='d' union all select taskparams,fname,'Taskparam',6 from (select DISTINCT b.caption||'-'||TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparamsui, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))taskparams, TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparams, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))fname from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (taskparamsui,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)a where substr(fname,1,1)='d') order by 4,1

esc_mailndays.a2: Escalation mail for every Nth day

a22.l: select cast(cnd as varchar(50)) cnd,flg,ord from (select 'Auto approve' cnd,1 flg,1 ord from dual where 'Cal days' = :esc_daytype union ALL select 'Actor',2 flg,3 ord FROM dual union all select 'Process owner',3 flg,4 ord FROM dual union ALL select 'Reporting manager',4 flg,5 ord FROM dual union all select 'Skip level',5 flg,7 ord FROM dual union all select 'Auto reject',6 flg,2 ord from dual where 'Cal days' = :esc_daytype union all select 'Initator reporting manager',7 flg,6 ord FROM dual )a order by ord

select cast(actorname as varchar(250)),ord from (select actorname,1 ord from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=1 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3) union all select actorname,2 ord from (select DISTINCT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(sprocessname, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) process,actorname,2 ord from axpdef_peg_actor a where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=2 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3) CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (sprocessname,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL order by 1)a where process = :processname AND 'Actor' = :escalate )a order by ord,1
select name mslist,'Templates' groupby,1 grouporder,'F' selected from axnotificationdef order by name

select cast(actorname as varchar(250)),ord from (select actorname,1 ord from axpdef_peg_actor where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=1 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3) union all select actorname,2 ord from (select DISTINCT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(sprocessname, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) process,actorname,2 ord from axpdef_peg_actor a where acttype=1 and applicablecnd=2 and assignmodecnd in(1,2,3) CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (sprocessname,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL order by 1)a where process = :processname AND 'Actor' = :escalate_notifyto )a order by ord,1

select cast(grp as varchar(300))grp,cnd,processownerflg,powner from (select actorname||'-(Actor)' grp,'Actor' cnd,1 processownerflg,actorname powner from axpdef_peg_actor where 1=2 union all select groupname||'-(Role)','Role',2 processownerfld,groupname from axusergroups)a order by 2,1

select cast(script as varchar(100)) mslist,'Mappings' groupby,1 grouporder, 'F' selected from (select distinct script from axtoolbar a where script is not null and stype='tstruct' and name=:transid union all select gname from axpgenmaps a where tstruct = :transid union all select mname from axpmdmaps a where tstruct = :transid )a order by 1

select cast(fldcaption as varchar(4000)) fldcaption,fname,cnd,ord FROM (select 'Date of notification-(static.ax__don)' fldcaption,'static.ax__don' fname ,'static' cnd,1 ord from dual where 1=2 union all select 'Date of initiation-(static.ax__doi)' fldcaption,'static.ax__doi' fname ,'static' cnd,2 ord from dual where 1=2 union all select caption||'-('||tstruct||'.'||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,fname ,'field' cnd,3 ord from axpflds where tstruct=:transid union all select 'AxVars_'||b.db_function||'-('||a.db_vartype||db_varname||')' fldcaption, db_vartype||db_varname fname, 'axvars' cnd,4 ord from axpdef_axvars_dbvar a,axpdef_axvars b where b.axpdef_axvarsid=a.axpdef_axvarsid and a.db_vartype='d' union all select caption||'-('||datatype||fname||')' fldcaption,datatype||fname fname,'GloVar',5 ord from axpflds where tstruct='axglo' and datatype='d' union ALL select taskparams,fname,'Taskparam',6 from (select DISTINCT b.caption||'-'||TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparamsui, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))taskparams, TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(taskparams, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))fname from axprocessdefv2 a,tstructs b where a.transid=b.name and length(a.taskparamsui)> 2 and a.processname = :processname and a.indexno < :indexno CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (taskparamsui,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)a where substr(fname,1,1)='d') ORDER BY 4,1

SELECT listagg(rtrim(SUBSTR(split_value,INSTR(split_value,'-(')+2),')'),',') WITHIN group(ORDER BY 1) FROM (SELECT distinct TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR( :taskparamsui, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL)) AS split_value from dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR ( :taskparamsui,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL)
select name from axnotificationdef order by name
select name from axnotificationdef order by name

select DISTINCT TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(cards, '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))mslist,'Cards' groupby,1 grouporder,'F' selected from axpdef_peg_processmaster where caption= :processname CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR (cards,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL order by 1

SELECT 'if recordid =0 '||chr(10)||LISTAGG(scr,chr(10)) WITHIN group(ORDER BY ord)||chr(10) FROM (SELECT distinct TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR( :formctrltmp , '[^~!~]+', 1, LEVEL)), '[^`j`]+', 1, 2))scr, TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR(TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR( :formctrltmp , '[^~!~]+', 1, LEVEL)), '[^`j`]+', 1, 1)) ord from dual where length(:formctrltmp) > 1 CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR ( :formctrltmp,'[^~!~]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 2)
select a.taskname from axprocessdefv2 a where a.axpdef_peg_processmasterid = :axpdef_peg_processmasterid and a.stransid='pgv2m' order by 1

select listagg(axprocessdefv2id,',') WITHIN group(ORDER BY 1) from axprocessdefv2 where axpdef_peg_processmasterid = :axpdef_peg_processmasterid and taskname in (SELECT distinct TRIM(REGEXP_SUBSTR( :allowedittasks , '[^,]+', 1, LEVEL))scr from dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR ( :allowedittasks ,'[^,]+',1,LEVEL) IS NOT NULL )

pgv2m0.a2: To create entry in process user

exprset.l3: firesql({a},{call fn_axprocessdefv2_index_update( :processname,cast( :indexno as numeric),'Delete',cast( :precid as numeric),cast( :oldindexno as numeric))})
